name: Campybara
description:
A cozy game where you furnish your dungeon to make it as relaxing or strange as you like. Explore an island and gather materials in order to make your ideal home.

Controls:

  • WASD: move
  • Mouse: look
  • Left Click: pick up
  • Right Click: put down
  • x: Sit

Place items near one another in the world to craft them together. Try to find all of the recipes.

Created By:

  • Nikola A.
  • Nick Valentine
